concept.title: 5305.303 Announcement of Contract Awards

li.p: (a) Public Announcement. Information on awards must not be released and awards shall not be made until after the agency announces the award on https://www.defense.gov/News/Contracts/ . Contract announcements are posted at 1700 EST daily.
